title: Accept match not appearing
body: Sometimes when I queue for a game the thing that pops up for me to accept the game won't show up. It will make the sound effect 4 for 5 seconds after my friends say they have all already accepted the match, but I remain in queue.

replies.body:
Ah, this particular issue has historically occurred when the client is having a hard time maintaining a solid connection to the PvP.net service, which is the service that serves these queue popups. I'd like you to check our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) out for some steps that should resolve this issue for you.

Should you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps, simply let me know so we can continue troubleshooting this together. ^.^
